title: and Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 234 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990 (Urban
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990 (Urban 

Areas) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations and the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 2023 may 

be cited together as the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited derelict site act 1990 (urban areas) regulation 2024 (2) regulation derelict site regulation 1990 2023 may cited together derelict site regulation 1990 2024

title: and Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 234 of
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990 

(No. 14 of 1990).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 1990 mean derelict site act 1990 (no 14 1990)

title: and Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 234 of
heading: 3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Clare
text_raw:
3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Clare 
specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(2) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Cork specified 
in Part 2 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the purposes of the 
Act of 1990. 

(3) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Kilkenny 
specified in Part 3 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(4) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Mayo specified 
in Part 4 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the purposes of the 
Act of 1990. 

(5) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Monaghan 
specified in Part 5 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(6) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Sligo specified 
in Part 6 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the purposes of the 
Act of 1990. 

(7) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Waterford 
specified in Part 7 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [606] 3
text_norm: 3 (1) area situated administrative county clare specified part 1 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (2) area situated administrative county cork specified part 2 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (3) area situated administrative county kilkenny specified part 3 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (4) area situated administrative county mayo specified part 4 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (5) area situated administrative county monaghan specified part 5 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (6) area situated administrative county sligo specified part 6 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (7) area situated administrative county waterford specified part 7 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 8th november 2024 606 3

title: and Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 234 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe areas in the cities/counties of County Clare, County 
Cork, County Kilkenny, County Mayo, County Monaghan, County Sligo and 
County Waterford indicated to be urban areas for the purposes of the Derelict 
Sites Act, 1990. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [606]
